task.name: smoothcal
task.shortdescription: Smooth calibration solution(s) derived from one or more sources:
task.description: A G- or T-type gain calibration can be smoothed. Amplitude and phase are currently smoothed with the same time. Calibration values will be smoothed over all fields.

param.name: caltable
param.description: Output calibration table (overwrite tablein if unspecified)

task.example:
A G- or T-type gain calibration can be smoothed. The amplitude and phase smoothing times are currently the same. Calibration values will be smoothed for only the specified fields. Smoothing is performed independently per field, per spw, and per antenna.
Keyword arguments: vis -- Name of input visibility file default: none; example: vis='ngc5921.ms' tablein -- Input calibration table (G or T) default: none; example: tablein='ngc5921.gcal' caltable -- Output calibration table (smoothed) default: '' (will overwrite tablein); example: caltable='ngc5921_smooth.gcal' field -- subset of fields to select and smooth default: '' means all; example: field='0319_415_1,3C286' smoothtype -- The smoothing filter to be used for both amp and phase default: 'median'; example: smoothtype='mean' Options: 'median','mean' smoothtime -- Smoothing filter time (sec) default: 300.0; example: smoothtime=60.
